hero.title: I'm Tricia
hero.subtitle: Ready to partner with you on your path to healing after a breakup and moving on with your life!
hero.description: Taking you from the pain of the past to the amazing future waiting for you.

user_pain_points.title: You've just had the rug pulled out from under you, right? You want to move on but not sure how best to do so?
user_pain_points.subtitle: Let me guess, right now you're...
pain_points: Struggling with overwhelming emotions and the isolation that often accompanies them.
Feeling you've lost a core part of your identity and purpose.
Trying to figure out how to rebuild a life that feels whole and fulfilling.

reviews.title: First Quote and Review
reviews.quote: Tricia is a compassionate and skilled therapist who has helped me navigate the emotional rollercoaster of grief and loss. She has a gift for helping people reconnect with their sense of self and purpose, and create a life that feels whole and fulfilling.
reviews.author: Jane Doe

reviews.title: Second Quote and Review
reviews.quote: Feeling you've lost a core part of your identity and purpose.
reviews.author: Paco

reviews.title: Third Quote and Review
reviews.quote: Trying to figure out how to rebuild a life that feels whole and fulfilling.
reviews.author: Maria

benefits.title: I've been there and know how to help you move forward...
benefits: Together we’ll tackle those intense emotions like anger,sadness and fear, so you can process them in a way that brings you clarity and peace of mind.
Heal the old patterns that kept you in toxic relationships and break free ready to create healthier, happier connections.
Move beyond feeling stuck or defeated, finding renewed confidence and feeling empowered to create a fresh vision for your future.

coaching_info.title: Coaching Info
coaching_info.subtitle: Breakups, separations, and divorces can be some of life’s most challenging moments, but they also hold the potential for profound transformation.
coaching_info.description: My Conscious Uncoupling coaching program is built around a proven 5-step process designed to help you heal your heart, reclaim your personal power, and create a brighter, more fulfilling future. This journey is about more than just moving on—it’s about moving forward with intention, healing, and hope. Together, we’ll transform your pain into power and uncover the limitless potential that awaits on the other side of heartbreak.

podcast.title: Learn & Listen
podcast.description: Join Tricia as she shares her personal journey of healing and transformation after a heartbreak. Listen to her insights and strategies for moving forward with intention, healing, and hope. Discover how to transform your pain into power and uncover the limitless potential that awaits on the other side of heartbreak.

hero.title: Work With Tricia
hero.subtitle: You’ve come to the right place and I’m glad you’re here. Let’s change your life for the better
hero.description: We’ll spend an hour once a week for twelve weeks in a private one-on-one session learning how to live your happy even after life and exploring new beginnings.

guide.title: Conscious Uncoupling
guide.subtitle: 5 Steps To Living Happily
guide.description: A powerful 12-Week Course, the 5 Steps of my Conscious Uncoupling Coaching Program, offers you the roadmap for how to turn the pain of your breakup into a genuine opportunity to recreate your life in a bigger and better way. This deeply personal approach will guide you through the devastating storm of the loss of love to finding emotional freedom, reclaiming your power and finally to getting your life back on track!!

steps.title: Finding Emotional Freedom
steps.description: Find the emotional space to move beyond the old painful patterns in love and use this shattering to radically evolve how you live and how you love.

steps.title: Reclaim Your Power And Your Life
steps.description: Let go of being a wounded victim of love shifting your perspective away from blame to taking full responsibility for your part in what happened.

steps.title: Break The Pattern
steps.description: Finally understand and break free of the painful experiences that have been at the heart of the repetitive patterns in your relationships and give yourself the opportunity to evolve beyond them.

steps.title: Become A Love Alchemist
steps.description: Begin to make choices and take actions that graduate you from the painful patterns of the past. Radically transform the dynamics between you and your former partner allowing for the possible emergence of a healthy new form the relationship has the potential to take.

steps.title: Create Your Happily Even After Life
steps.description: Get the support you will need to make wise, healthy and life-affirming decisions as you take on the essential  tasks of reinventing your life.  Set up the vital new structures that will ensure that the new life you’re embracing will be greater than the one you are letting go of.

payment_plan.title: 90-Day Coaching Package Includes:
payment_plan.description: 3 months of 12 private one-on-one 60-minute sessions via Zoom

payment_plan.title: 90-Day Coaching Package Plus One 2-Hour Jump Start Intensive Includes:
payment_plan.description: 3 months of 12 private one-on-one 60-minute sessions plus one 2-hourintensive via Zoom

connect.title: Excited to get started? Me too!
connect.subtitle: Let's connect and discuss how best I can serve you.
connect.description: Let’s talk about what’s concerning you most and the thoughts that are keeping you up at night. Share with me “the story” and how it unfolded, and let me help you to put the pieces back together again.

hero.title: let's chat
hero.subtitle: Ready to chat about your needs? I’d love to get to know you and find out more about you.
hero.description: I’m here to help take you to take that next step and to move into that next level that you’ve been dreaming about!

hero.title: Let's Get Personal
hero.description: Are you ready to make a shift? It's time to dream big.
hero.paragraph: When life breaks you, it’s because you are ready to be put back together differently. Every piece of you that feels shattered, is a piece that will find a new place, a new purpose, a new meaning. Trust that the cracks are where the light gets in.

content.first: A certified Conscious Uncoupling and Relationship Coach, trained and personally mentored by Katherine Woodward Thomas, the New York Times bestselling author of Conscious Uncoupling: 5 Steps to Living Happily Even After.
content.second: My mission is to uplift and inspire women as they navigate the often-devastating process of ending a significant relationship. Having been down this challenging path myself, I'm here to help you channel your heartbreak into a powerful opportunity for growth, supporting you in creating a more fulfilling life.
content.third: From Long Island, New York, I work globally, connecting with clients from all walks of life who are ready to rebuild with intention and hope.

second.title: Where I started
second.description: Making Food The Language of Love
second.content: Before becoming a coach, I spent years as a professional chef, dedicated to making beautiful food and to creating warmth and connection around the table. My Italian parents and their culinary heritage contributed significantly to my love of all things having to do with food. Today, I bring that same sense of warmth and nourishment into my coaching, fostering an environment where my clients feel seen, supported, and encouraged to reach for a better, more fulfilling life. Just as a recipe, with the right ingredients and care, can be transformed into something amazing, we can transform our lives in the very same way after loss.

fun-facts.title: I’m nothing without my morning routine.  It jumpstarts all the good vibes.
I fell in love with food in Italy and my Italian parents and it’s a big part of my life.
I would spend every day at the beach if I could.  Whether relaxing, working or playing  It’s my happy place.
My friendships are my “window on the world” through which I learn so much about myself.

enough.title:
My 5-Step Journey to Freedom

 and Personal Power
enough.about_course:
My approach blends intuitive and spiritual guidance with a proven, strategic 5-step process designed to help you reclaim your purpose and create a life that's even bigger and better than the one you're leaving behind.

I know the pain and uncertainty that comes with the loss of a significant relationship. I've been there-standing at the edge of a breakthrough but unsure of my next steps. When I discovered the Conscious Uncoupling process, I took a leap of faith, left an unhappy marriage, and stepped into my personal power. That decision set me on a path of profound transformation.

Today, I'm living an expanded, fulfilling life- entertaining in my beautiful home, traveling the world, embracing new cultures, and redefining my relationship with my former husband in a way that fosters respect and friendship. Trust me, you can make this shift in your life too!

footer.title: Transformational relationship coaching for women who are looking to create the life of their dreams.
footer.subtitle: Tricia Rago
